description:
For ladies who take a shine to the whole mountain. This playful ski doesn't get skittish on the hardpack or bogged down in the soft stuff. The twin rocker profile floats through powder without sacrificing stability and power for the groomers. Light in the tip and tail for easy steering and agility, this ski trips the light fantastic.

  • Full poplar wood core offers great stability and ski-to-snow contact
  • Internally milled wood core offers great stability and rebound
  • Titanal insert edge-to-edge underfoot helps with power transfer and edging on hard snow
  • Layer of carbon and flax laminate keeps the weight low while increasing the ski's dampness
  • Twin rocker offers a mix of precision and manoeuvrability
  • Sandwich construction features ABS sidewall all around the ski for increase durability and strength
  • 5-point sidecut improves steering in mixed snow and makes for a quick and agile ski
  • Cork tip and tail are lightweight and reduce vibration without sacrificing control
  • Glossy topsheet looks sharp and won't hold snow
name: Salomon QST Lumen 98 Skis - Women's
